data.event: Several rock and mineral shops have been around since the mining boom days.

event.title: June 2013 the main village well stopped

data.event: In June 2013 the main village well stopped yielding water, leading to a period of conservation during which other New Mexico communities and organizations donated drinking and stock water for distribution to residents until local wells were brought back into operation later in the year.

event.title: were brought back into operation later in the year
